texts.en: Marina is 45, widowed and has four children. She has owned and managed a vegetable production business in their village for almost one year and earns a net income of PHP 150 daily. Her net income from this business usually is spent on the school allowances of her children and daily expenses at home. Due to insufficient funds in her business, she would like to take a loan of PHP 12,000 to purchase seedlings and fertilizers for her vegetable production. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow and become more productive.

loans.use: To purchase seedlings and fertilizers for her vegetable production.

loans.name: Grupo Las Abejas Group

texts.es:
Las calles de Suchitepéquez es testigo de los colores más vistosos impregnados en las blusas y fajas típicas.  Es imposible que cualquier turista deje de admirar este producto, pararse y hacer una buena compra de ello. De 35 años de edad ya con grandes aspiraciones en dar a conocer a su comunidad y a todos los que la visitan la actividad que ella realiza con tanto esfuerzo y dedicación, soltera y con grandes deseo de superar en la vida e alcanzar grandes sueños que ella quiere realizar en la vida, ella tiene cuatro hijos los primeros dos hijos ya tienen familias apartes y los dos últimos son excelentes estudiantes en la escuela de su comunidad, (Maria  es la que se encuentra de 1ra de derecha a izquierda de la fotografía)
	
El trabajo que ella realiza con tanto esmero es la compra y venta de cortes típicas dicha actividad lo realiza en su casa y en lugares cercanos de su comunidad donde ella vive, ella lleva realizando dicha actividad durante 12 años, la segunda actividad que ella realiza es la venta de refacciones negocio que realiza con una hermana por más de cinco años porque les genera una ganancia para el bienestar de su familia y mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia y comunidad.

Ella ha sido un ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de mujeres se han unido a Maria para poder emprender sus negocios para que cada uno de ellas pueda supera y tener ingresos importantes.

El uso que ella le dará al préstamo que ella está realizando es para la compra de mercadería de trajes típicas para luego venderlas por los alrededores de su comunidad. Uno de las aspiraciones de ella es tener un local en el mercado de su comunidad y ver que sus hijos se convierten en profesionales en la vida.
texts.en:
The streets of Suchitepéquez are filled with the colourful sights of dresses and sashes that are typical in this area.  They cannot fail to attract the tourist´s attention and often result in them buying one themselves as a souvenir.  

Maria, 35, who appears first on the right in the photo, has a lot of ambition.  She wants to make her community well-known and show visitors the work she does with such effort and dedication.  She is single and has four children.  Her first two children already have their own families.  The other two are excellent pupils at the local school. 

Maria works hard to improve and to reach the goals that she sets herself in life.   Her job, which she carries out with such diligence, is to buy and sell different cuts of the typical cloth.  She does this from her own home and in areas close by.  She has been doing this for 12 years.  

Apart from this, she also sells snacks.  She has been in this business with her sister for more than five years.  This particular activity allows them to earn an income to be able to provide for their family and improve their economic situation as well as provide impulse for the community.  

She is an example in her area, which is why a group of women have joined forces with her to be able to set up their own businesses which will allow them to generate an income.  

Maria will use the loan to buy cloth for the typical dresses which she will sell around her neighborhood.  One of her aims is to have a market stall in her area and also to see her children become working professionals.

loans.use: to buy clothing supplies.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos vive con su cónyuge y su menor hijo, es conviviente, vive en casa propia, desde hace más de 20 años. Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales, tiene una familia unida. Él vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería; ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

Carlos se dedica a la venta de pescado fresco y venta de cerdos. Desde hace más de 05 años aproximadamente. El destino del préstamo es para compra de pescado y alimentación balanceado para los cerdos para poder engordarlos adecuadamente y pder venderlos a un mejor precio, lo que le generá mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejora en la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his partner and younger son, he is in a common-law marriage, has been living in his own house for over 20 years. He has good work and personal references, he has a united family. He lives in a community which works in trade, agriculture and cattle-raising; located in the Cayalti district, Chiclayo province, Cajamarca region, Peruvian northern highlands.

Carlos works selling fresh fish and doing pig sales. He has done this for about 5 years. The aim of the loan is to buy fish and balanced feed for the pigs to be able to fatten them adequately and be able to sell them at a better price, which will generate more income, better earnings to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fish and balanced feed for fattening pigs.

loans.name: Helaria

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Helaria works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fresh and dried fish. She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase fishing nets, gasoline, wood, etc. for her fishing business.

Helaria has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets, gasoline, wood, etc.

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is 35 years old and is a married woman with six children, four of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Divina has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,500 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts and gasoline for her motorcycle. She has been in this business for 6 years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and gasoline for her motorcycle

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 37 years old and married with five children, two of whom are in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Rosalie has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

She aspires to save enough money to expand her business and to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Leslie Tatiana

texts.es: Leslie   de 22 años de edad,  soltera y sin hijos, es un agradable estudiante de la facultad de obstetricia  ya está en último ciclo con la ayuda de sus padres  está logrando muchas cosas,  Leslie  ha sabido salir adelante estudiar mucho y  así culminar sus estudios y así poder ser  exitosa en la vida. Con el préstamo otorgado ella podrá realizar los pagos de su matrícula universitaria y la vez compra de útiles de estudio que necesita. Leslie  se encuentra muy agradecida  por la ayuda brindada que le está siendo  Kiva  y Edaprospo y se despide con un fuerte abrazo y diciéndoles que cumplirá la promesa de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Leslie is 22 years old, single and without children, she is a pleasant student in the faculty of obstetrics who is in her last cycle, with the help of her parents she is achieving many things. Leslie knows how to get ahead - study a lot and thus finish her studies, to able to be successful in life. With the authorized loan she will be able to make the payments on her university tuition and also buy supplies which are necessary for her studies.

Leslie is very grateful for the help being offered by Kiva and Edaprospo and she says goodbye with a big hug, saying that she will fulfill her promise to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for study.

loans.name: Segundo Juan

texts.es:
Segundo Juan tiene 57 años de edad, es conviviente, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia, en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque.

Segundo Juan se dedica a brindar servicio de carga en su motocarguera, desde hace 14 años, el ofrece este servicio en su distrito y alrededores a comercianetes y moradores que le piden que traslade su mercaderia y/o muebles. Él solicita préstamo para invertir en Activo fijo, pues desea construir una habitación en su domicilo; para lo cual deberá comprar cemento, ladrillos, etc. Esto le ayudará a darle mayor comodidad y seguridad a su familia mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Segundo Juan, 57, lives with his common-law wife in his own home in the rural area of the district of Oyotún, province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque.  He has no children in his care.

Segundo Juan has been running a motorcycle transport service for 14 years.  He works in his district and surrounding areas serving merchants and residents who need transport of goods and/or furniture.  The loan he is requesting is to invest in fixed assets as he wants to build a room at his house.  He must buy cement, bricks, etc.  This will make it more comfortable for his family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: To invest in fixed assets by building a room.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hardworking entrepreneur who sells vegetables in the Philippines.
She is borrowing PHP 12,500 through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell. Erlinda has been in this business for 10 years. Erlinda earns more income from a food stall and a general store.
Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Maria Elvia

texts.es:
María es una mujer ecuatoiana de  23 años de edad nacida en el Cantón Sigchos de la provincia de Cotopaxi, perteneciente a la República del Ecuador, es soltera, gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres pudo culminar la secundaria, por la mala situación económica de su hogar tubo que migrar a la ciudad es por eso que hoy en día vive en la ciudad de Latacunga en un barrio rural , ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos y a la agricultura, María es una joven  emprendedora  y muy trabajadora, vive en casa propia desde hace varios años junto a su esposo e hijos, su conyugue trabaja como ayudante en una tienda y le ayuda en los gastos familiares.
María vino a nosotros recomendada por su madre quien es cliente de la Fundacion, requiere el crédito para terminar de construir un cuarto en su casa.
Quiere en esta ocasión  agradecer a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y hogar.
texts.en:
María, 23, is from Ecuador and was born in the Sigchos Canton in the province of Cotopaxi.  She is single and, thanks to the efforts of her parents, was able to finish her secondary education.  Due to the household's poor economic situation she had to migrate to the city and now lives in Latacunga in a rural community.  She raises and sells chickens and works in agriculture.  María is a young, hard-working entrepreneur who has lived in her own house for several years with her husband and children.  Her husband works as a store assistant and helps cover family expenses.

María came to us through recommendation by her mother who is a Foundation client.  She needs the loan to finish one of the rooms of her house.  She wants to thank the Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and Kiva for making possible growth in her work and home life.

loans.use: To finish building her house.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 45 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school.
Josephine works hard to provide for her family by running a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF, in order to purchase more groceries to sell.
Josephine has borrowed and paid back seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and earns an additional income from selling bamboo.
Josephine aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries  for her general store.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who buys and sells ready to wear products in the Philippines.
She is borrowing PHP 24,000 through NWTF to buy additional items such as jeans, shorts, t-shirts, sacks, etc. for her ready to wear business.
Jocelyn has been in this business for 5 years. Jocelyn earns additional income from a general store and buying and selling vegetables.
Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like jeans, shorts, t-shirts, sacks, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Jessica works hard to support her family.
She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines, and earns additional income from a general store. Jessica is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.
Jessica has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en:
Estilita is married and she works hard to support her family.
She has a general store in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending. Estilita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.
Estilita has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to stock her general store.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Sololá se caracteriza por ser una ciudad bien poblada con casas muy bien estructuradas y modernas,  construidas con materiales muy sofisticada. El desarrollo socioeconómico ha sido un factor principal pero también la mano de obra por albañiles y constructores calificados como es el caso de Manuel albañil de 29 años de edad con una familia de cinco  hijos, los dos primeros hijos ya tiene familias separadas y los tres últimos son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de su comunidad.

La actividad que el realiza es la albañilería el lleva realizando dicha actividad durante 7 años y se a convertido en una muy buena fuente de ingresos par el y su familia,  el es muy dedicado a su trabajo lo realiza de la forma más correcta y rápida para dejar las construcciones de su comunidad muy bien hechas. La segunda actividad que el realiza es agricultor en la comunidad donde el vive, el lo realiza porque por medio de ella puede tener un ingreso extra par mejorar las condiciones de su familia.

El crédito que ha solicitado es para la remodelación de su vivienda ya que las condiciones de su vivienda ya no son las adecuadas para que una persona pueda vivir en ella, es el motivo que ha llevado a Manuel a realizar un crédito para poder mejorar su vivienda y así tener las condiciones de vida adecuada de el y su familia. Uno de sus sueños mientras corre el tiempo es convertirse en un maestro de obras y enseñarles a sus hijos el mismo oficio y que ellos estudien para que sean profesionales en el mañana.
texts.en:
Solola is is city which boasts many well-built and modern houses.  They are built with very sophisticated materials.  The socio-economic development of the area has been a major factor, but in addition, the work done by builders and bricklayers is also crucial.

One such builder is Manuel, 29.  He has a family with five children.  His first two children have started their own families and the rest are excellent students at the local school.  

He has been a builder for seven years and it has since become a good source of income for him and his family.  He is very dedicated to his work and he carries it out always to the best of his abilities and as quickly as he can.  In doing so, his community can enjoy the best quality constructions possible.  

The other job he has is as a farmer, near where he lives.  He does this extra work because it gives him an additional income which he uses to improve his family's situation.  

He is asking for a loan to refurbish his house, because it is in a state which is not suitable for him and his family.  

One of his dreams is to become a teacher so he can teach building to his children.  He also wants his children to study a professional career in the future.

loans.use: refurbish his house.

loans.name: Blanca Lisseth

texts.es:
Blanca, se dedica a vender comida, hamburguesas, hot dogs, etc., vive con su familia la cual está integrada por su esposo y tres hijos de 11, 9 y 7 años de edad, sus hijos son dependientes; su negocio funciona desde hace 5 años, su horario de trabajo es de seis de la mañana a seis de la tarde, tiene empleadas que le ayudan a realizar los diferentes labores, el oficio lo aprendió siendo empleada, su mayor ventaja es la ubicación del negocio.
Está solicitando capital de trabajo para construir una galera para ubicar dos coches en los que elabora hamburguesas, espera ampliar su local, mejorar el servicio, atraer nuevos clientes y mantenerse trabajando para seguir teniendo recursos económicos para cumplir con sus obligaciones. Los riesgos son el alto nivel de delincuencia en la zona.
Sus proyectos son hacer crecer su negocio, apoyar a sus hijos para que se preparen académicamente y comprar un vehículo para compartir en familia y trasladar la mercancía.
texts.en:
Blanca sells food, hamburgers, hot dogs, etc. and lives with her family consisting of her husband and three children, ages 11, 9 and 7.  Her children are dependents.  She has been in business for five years and works from 6:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. with two employees who help with the different work activities.  Blanca learned the trade when she was an employee and her greatest advantage now is the location of her business.

She is requesting a loan to build a cooking galley where she can set up two hamburger stands.  She wants to expand her locale and improve her service to attract new customers and stay in business to continue earning an income to meet her obligations.  The risk she is up against is the high level of delinquency in the area.

Her goal is to grow her business, support her children in their academic training and buy a vehicle to share with the family and transport merchandise.

loans.use: To build a cooking galley for her hamburger stands.

loans.name: Esperanza Y Progreso De La Zona B Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Esperanza Y Progreso De La Zona B” y está conformado por 08 socios solidarios y responsables. Carmen de 19 años de edad es soltera. Hace más de 01 año que Carmen se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir. Ella distribuye sus productos a domicilio lo cual le va bien donde su mayor deseo es contar con un local para poder mostrar sus productos de prendas de vestir. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de medias, pantalones, polos y camisas. El grupo “Esperanza Y Progreso De La Zona B” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. Carmen es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste casaca plomo.
texts.en:
This is the communal bank "Esperanza y Progreso de la Zona B" and it is comprised of eight supportive, responsible members. Carmen, 19, is single and for over a year she has been selling clothing.  She distributes her products through home delivery and business is going well.  Her greatest desire is to have a shop where she can display her clothing line.  She used her previous loan to buy stockings, pants, polo shirts and shirts.

The "Esperanza y Progreso de la Zona B" group is grateful to the lenders involved in this loan.  Carmen is the first one on the left wearing a gray jacket.

loans.use: To buy stockings, pants, polo shirts and shirts.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
La señora Teresa  es una persona responsable, trabajadora y honesta, vive  con sus hijos y nietos  en el  sur de Honduras. Su negocio es  el  servicio  de molino,  desde hace mas de13 años. 
Doña Teresa el préstamo lo necesita para la compra  de un  motor para su molino. Con el préstamo espera que las ventas en su negocio aumenten al tener su molino en optimo estado y así atender mejor  a sus clientes. 
Doña Teresa  espera cubrir las necesidades  que tiene y mejorar un poco su calidad  de vida  de su familia. En unos años espera que su negocio siga  creciendo  y se convierta en una tienda más grande y reconocido de la zona y que sus hijos y nietos  se conviertan en personas de bien y con mejores oportunidades en la   sociedad. 	



Choluteca, Honduras  –  Agosto  del   2014
texts.en:
Teresa is a responsible, hard-working and honest person.  She lives with her children and grandchildren in the south of Honduras.  She has a milling business; a service she has been offering for more than 13 years.  

She needs the loan to buy a motor for her mill.  This money will therefore keep her mill in the best condition possible and she hopes that this will result in an increase in sales, as she offers a better service to her clients.  

She would like to take care of her expenses and improve a little the standard of living of her family.  In some years, she hopes that the business will still be growing and will become one of the biggest and well-known in the area.  

Another desire is to see her children and grandchildren grow up to be good people who have better opportunities in society.

loans.use: to buy a motor for her business.

loans.name: Hortencia

texts.es:
Hortencia tiene 50 años de edad, es viuda, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia; en una zona rural del distrito de Niepos, provincia de San Miguel, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

Hortencia se dedica a la elaboración y venta de panes, bizcochos, dulces; hace 10 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para invertir en capital de trabajo; compra de insumos para su negocio; dado que la demanda de su producto a incrementado y necesita hacer una mayor cantidad para poder satisfacer a todo su público consumidor. Esto en un corto plazo le generará mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por en de una mejora en la calidad de su vida.
texts.en:
Hortencia, 50, is a widow and has no dependent children.  She lives in her own house in a rural area of the district of Niepos, province of San Miguel, in the Cajamarca region along the northern mountain range of Peru.

Hortencia makes and sells breads, cakes and pastries and has been in business for 10 years, working out of her home.  The loan she is requesting is to use as work capital to buy supplies for her business.  Since the demand for her products in increasing she needs to produce more to satisfy her public.  In the short term this will generate more income, more profit and therefore improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 57 years old and married with three children. With one child in school, Vilma works very hard to provide for them.
Vilma runs a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.
Vilma has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, noodles and other school supplies.
In the future, Vilma would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Lorlyn

texts.en:
Lorlyn is 32 years old and has three children. Lorlyn is married and all of her children are in school.
Lorlyn is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Lorlyn requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.
Lorlyn has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.
In the future, Lorlyn would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 33 years old and married with three children.
Gina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like biscuits, canned goods and other groceries.
Gina has borrowed and paid back four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and earns additional income from pig fattening.
Gina aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more items like biscuits, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 52 years old and married with three children, all of whom attend school. Alma works very hard to provide for them.

Alma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Alma has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Alma would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Celia Emelina

texts.es:
Cecilia, utilizo el préstamo anterior para comprar insumos que le faciliten continuar elaborando la venta de comida y tamales, de esta manera sus clientes tienen mayor satisfacción, sus ventas han mejorado, la situación económica es más estable, su familia se mantiene con el mismo número de integrantes.
Nuevamente recurre a solicitar ayuda para comprar verduras, maíz, aceite, carnes, condimentos, granos básicos, entre otros materiales con los que su negocio seguirá activo y generando ingresos necesarios para cancelar la nueva deuda y cubrir los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Cecilia used the previous loan to buy supplies which enabled her to continue making and selling food and tamales, in this way her customers get better satisfaction. Her sales have improved, her economic situation is more stable, her family is supported with the same number of members.

She turns to a loan once again to help her buy vegetables, corn, oil, meat, spices, staple grains, amongst other materials with which her business will continue operating and earning necessary income to repay the new loan and meet her family expenses.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, corn, oil, meat, spices, staple grains, etc.

loans.name: Juana De La Cruz

texts.es:
Juana, tiene un núcleo familiar integrado por su esposo y una bebe de 5 meses de nacida, su estado civil es acompañada; se dedica a atender un comedor y una tienda de productos de uso doméstico, ella inicio su negocio desde al año 2010, su horario de atención al público es de 5:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., el oficio aprendió a desarrollarlo con su madre.
Utilizará el préstamo para comprar embutidos, carnes, granos básicos, bebidas, pan, verduras, golosinas, etc. y mesas y sillas, de esta manera su comedor y la tienda estarán mejor abastecidas, espera invertir en esta temporada para mejorar sus ingresos.
Su visión es ampliar su negocio y ofrecer mayor variedad de mercadería.
texts.en:
Juana's family consists of her husband and a five-month-old baby; and her business involves a diner and grocery store.  She started her activity in 2010.  Her work schedule is from 5:00 a.m to 5:00 p.m. and she learned the trade from her mother.

She will use the loan to buy sausages, meats, basic grains, beverages, bread, vegetables, sweets, etc. and tables and chairs.  This will provide her diner and store with more supplies.  She wants to invest in the business this season to improve her income.  Her goal is to expand and offer a wider variety of merchandise.

loans.use: To buy sausages, meats, basic grains, beverages, bread, vegetables, sweets, etc. and tables and chairs for her store and diner.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee plantations and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for school fees and purchase educational materials for her oldest son

loans.name: Joy Me

texts.en:
Joy Me is 36 years old and married with three children.  With two children in school, Joy Me works very hard to provide for them.

Joy Me runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Joy Me has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future Joy Me would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 32 years old and married with one child who is in school.

Emily is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Emily requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Emily has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Emily would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 50 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Analiza has a tobacco retailing business in the Philippines. Analiza requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of tobacco to sell.

Analiza has been in this business for four years. In the future, Analiza would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of tobacco to sell.

loans.name: Parveen's Group

texts.en: Parveen is a housewife and the mother of seven children. Her husband runs a retail store selling groceries such as vegetables, fruits and meat. Parveen is finding it extremely difficult to make ends meet because the expenses of the children are increasing day by day as they are growing up. Rather than reinvesting income into their retail store, Parveen and her husband have to take care of the family expenses. The retail store has run out of stock due to lack of funds at Parveen and her husband's disposal. Therefore Parveen wants a loan to help her husband refill the stocks at the store and also expand his business by including small electrical appliances such as bulbs and lamps plus the stationery which includes pens and registers.

loans.use: to buy stock of goods for her general store.

loans.name: Aytakin

texts.en:
Aytakin is a 30-year-old refugee. She is married with a daughter and two sons. The family has lived in an IDP settlement for a long time and the parents try to provide their children with a bright future and education. The father of the family earns money working as laborer and Aytakin is a gardener. She raises seasonal vegetables and greens in the backyard and sells them. She earns 200 AZN monthly and this is the main source of income for the poor family.
Aytakin has been selling her harvest in a small grocery next to her house for the past 8 years and local people attend it very often. They know that Aytakin sells quality and fresh produce. Though Aytakin loves gardening very much, the income from the grocery doesn’t cover her family’s demands. She applied for a loan of 1500 AZN loan in order to buy a small plot of land to grow more vegetables and fruits. She wants to make a higher income and help her children to live a normal life as it was before they became refugees.

loans.use: to buy a small plot of land to grow more vegetables and fruits

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia tiene 71 años de edad, su estado civil es soltera. Tiene casa propia, cuenta con servicios públicos(agua y luz). Lidia vive en el distrito de Buenos Aires a 20 minutos de Morropón. Ella es natural de la zona. La comunidad es pequeña y los pobladores se dedican a la crianza de ganado, comercio y al comercio de platano; dicha comunidad esta ubicada en el distrito de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte e Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla Lidia es la siembra y comercialización de platano y la crianza de ganado menor y aves. Ella desea crédito para abonar su siembre de platano, para fortalecer su producción y poder venderlo a un mejor precio, lo que le ayudará a incrementar sus ingresos, mejorar sus ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lidia is 71 years old and is single. She has her own house and relies on public services (water and electricity). Lidia lives in the Buenos Aires district of Morropon, which is located in the Piura region on the north coast of Peru. She was born and raised in the area. The community is small and its inhabitants make a living breeding livestock and working in the banana trade. 

The work that she has developed is sowing and marketing bananas as well as breeding young livestock and birds. She would like the loan to buy fertilizer for her banana seeds to produce a bigger and better yield and be able to sell it at a better price. This would enable her to earn more and increase her profits as well as her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her banana seeds.

loans.name: Mom

texts.en: Mom is a 23-year-old married woman with a small child. She is a garment-factory worker. She has been in this job since 2012. Her husband is 34 years old and a construction foreman. They live in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. Together, they can earn approximately $10 per day. Now Mom would like to request a loan for her husband to buy more construction tools such as scaffolding, wood, poles and wooden pillar mold to use in his construction work. This loan will help her husband work faster with sufficient tools. In the future, she is going to build a new house.

loans.use: to buy more construction tools such as scaffolding, wood, poles, and wooden pillar mold for her husband's construction business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and purchase educational equipment for her oldest child.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel tiene 48 años de edad, es casado, sin hijos a su cargo, vive con su esposa; en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Miguel se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ella solicita préstamo para compra de más animales, para diversificar y aumentar su stock, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en sus ventas ya que podrá satisfacer todos los gustos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Miguel is 48 years old, he is married but does not have children he needs to care for. He lives with his wife in a rural area of the district of Oyotún in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru.

Miguel works raising and selling animals and has more than 10 years experience in this trade. He keeps the animals in a back part of his home. He asks for a loan to buy more animals in order to diversify and increase his stock. This investment will help him to have a greater variety and make his sales more productive, as he will be able to meet all the demands of his customers.

loans.use: to buy more animals in order to diversify and increase his stock.

loans.name: Jesily

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Jesily works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling purified drinking water and soft-drinks. Jesily is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy gasoline and spare parts for her motorcycle for her motorcycle transport business.

Jesily has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and spare parts for her motorcycle for her motorcycle transport business.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a  business selling dry goods in the Philippines.

Marites requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of dry goods like blouses, bags, t-shirts, etc. to sell.

She has been in this business for 12 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Marites would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of dry goods like blouses, bags, t-shirts, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Deolinda

texts.en: Deolinda has been involved in business activities since 2012 and started with her own working capital of $600. She has a kiosk but the income is not enough to add the items in her store.  So she is requesting a loan of $1000 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She will use the loan proceeds to buy additional supplies to keep in her kiosk including candles, sugar, biscuits, milk, sardines, soap, slippers, water, cooking oils, books, candies, salts, detergents and soft drinks etc. She is happy with the loan offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies to keep in her kiosk including candles, sugar, biscuits, milk, sardines, soap, slippers, water, cooking oils, books, candies, salts, detergents and soft drinks etc.

loans.name: Elza

texts.en:
Elza is 55 years old and married with two daughters. The family is IDP (Internally Displaced People) and lives in an IDP settlement. Her husband is a laborer but their main source of income is from animal husbandry. Elza breeds two cows for dairy products such as cheese, milk and butter which she then sells. She receives an income of 180AZN monthly for this. 

Husbandry has expanded in Azerbaijan. The productivity of husbandry depends on the area, location and climate. Elza knows everything about husbandry because she has worked in this field for 24 years. She makes very delicious and fresh products from milk.

Elza is a very wise and responsible woman. She loves her job very much but this doesn’t cover the demands of her family. She applied for a 1,500AZN loan to buy an additional cow which will increase productivity as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy an additional cow and increase the productivity of her animal husbandry business.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rosalinda is 59 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Rosalinda has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fabric, threads, zippers, etc. for her business.

Rosalinda has been in this business for 24 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like fabric, threads, zippers, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, foliar feed, fertilizers, and to pay for labor to apply those to the crops.

loans.name: Emmanuelita

texts.en:
Emmanuelita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  She is 44 years old and has three children who are in school.

Emmanuelita has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

Emmanuelita has been in this business for 25 years. In the future, Emmanuelita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Tomas Santos

texts.es: Tomas de 36 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hija de 12 años de edad. El es un hombre trabajador que se desempeña como albañil en los cantones cercanos a su vivienda, dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 15 años, por lo que las personas siempre lo buscan para solicitar sus servicios, y es gracias a su trabajo que ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia. Tomas desea cambiar el techo del corredor de su vivienda por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lamina, polines, pines cemento y arena para cambiar el techo del corredor de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Tomas is 36 years old. He lives in his own house together with his partner and his 12-year-old daughter. He is a hard-working man who works as a bricklayer in the neighborhoods close to his home. He has worked as a bricklayer for 15 years, and so people seek to solicit his services. Thanks to his work, he could get his family ahead. 

Tomas wants to change the roof of the corridor of his house. For this, he asks for a loan with FUSAI in order to invest it in: galvanized metal sheeting, beams, fasteners, cement, and sand to change the roof of the corridor of his house.

loans.use: to purchase: galvanized metal sheeting, beams, fasteners, cement, and sand to change the ceiling of the corridor of his house.

loans.name: Zefanias

texts.pt:
O senhor Zefanias de 58 é reformado, casado e pai de 6 filhos dos quais 3 a estudarem no nivel secundario 2 no primario 1 ainda menor vive na casa propria.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a casa para dar um lar condigno a sua famίlia e continuar a sustentar os estudos de seus filhos.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mr Zefanias is 58 and retired, married and the father of 6 children, 3 of whom are in high school, 2 in primary school and one is still too young for school. He lives in a house he owns.

With this loan he will buy cement, sand, stone and rods to build his house.

His projects and dreams include finishing his house so he can have a decent home for his family and to continue supporting his children's studies.

He says his main challenges have been financial ones to finish the construction of his house and that he will be soliciting further loans to carry out his projects.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, stone and rods to build his house

loans.name: Tomas

texts.pt:
O senhor Tomas é técnico electrotecnia por conta propria, casado e pai de 5 filhos dos quais 3 estudarem  2 ainda menores vive na casa propria sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ele.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a casa, ampliar o seu negocio construir um estabelecimento na sua casa para reforçar  a renda familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mr Tomas is a self-employed electrical technician, married and the father of 5 children - 3 who go to school and 2 who are still too young. He lives in a house he owns and also supports a nephew who lives with him. 

With this loan he will buy cement, sand, stone and rods to build his house.

His projects and dreams are to finish the construction of his house, expand his business and to build a commercial establishment at his home to reinforce his family's income.

He says his main challenges have been financial ones to finish building his house and that he will be soliciting further loans to carry out his projects.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, stone and rods to build his house.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: María de 46 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 19, 11 y 7 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que gracias a su esfuerzo y tenacidad ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos en compañía de su esposo, y gracias a que presta sus servicios domésticos de forma domiciliar. María siempre está buscando la manera de mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus hijos por lo que anteriormente solicito a FUSAI un crédito para reparar el techo de su vivienda, pero además colocó paredes de lamina a su champa, con el crédito anterior, por lo que nuevamente solicita un crédito a FUSAI para seguir construyendo su vivienda, para lo que deberá comprar: madera, clavos y lamina para seguir construyendo su vivienda. María manifiesta sentirse muy contenta ya que gracias al apoyo recibido ha logrado ir construyendo poco a poco su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is 46 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband and their three children, who are 19, 11, and 7 years old. She is a woman who, thanks to her efforts and her tenacity, has managed to get her children ahead - together with her husband, and thanks to offering her services as a household help.

María is always looking for ways to improve the living conditions of her children. This is why she has previously asked for a loan with FUSAI in order to repair the roof of her home, but she also set up walls of galvanized metal sheeting in her hut with the previous loan.

She is now asking for a loan again in order to continue the construction work in her home, for which she wants to buy: wood, nails, and galvanized metal sheets.

María says she is very happy, because thanks to the help she received, she is able to continue improving her house step by step.

loans.use: to buy: wood, nails, and galvanized metal sheeting to continue the construction work in her home.

loans.name: Francisca Yamileth

texts.es:
Francisca, es casada, vive con su esposo y un hijo, los dos tienen actividades económicas diferentes para generar ingresos con los que pueden cubrir las necesidades familiares;  Francisca se dedica a elaborar tortillas para vender, lo realiza de seis de la mañana a dos de la tarde, el oficio lo aprendió siendo empleada en una tortillería, posteriormente con su experiencia abrió su propio negocio, en este momento no representa dificultades.
El capital lo necesita para comprar maíz al por mayor, con esta inversión dispondrá de la materia prima para elaborar la venta de tortillas, reducirá costos en la compra al por mayor teniendo así un buen margen de ganancias, espera tener una mejor situación económica para resarcir su deuda sin problemas.
Sus aspiraciones son mantenerse trabajando para en un futuro tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Francisca is married, she lives with her husband and one son. She and her husband have different jobs in order to earn the income to cover the necessary household expenses. Francisca works making and selling tortillas. She works from 6 o' clock in the morning until 2 o' clock in the afternoon. She learnt this trade when she was an employee in a tortilla store. Later, with the experience she had gathered, she opened her own business, which at the moment does not encounter any problems.

She needs the loan to buy corn in bulk. With this investment, she will have the main supply available to prepare and sell tortillas. She will reduce her purchase costs when she buys in bulk, and therefore will have a higher profit margin. She expects to improve her economic situation in order to repay her debt without any problems. 

Her plan is to continue working in order to have her own house in the future.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk. With this investment, she will have the main supply available to prepare and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is a married woman and has been blessed with five kids who attend school. She lives in her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees. 

Mercy operates a poultry-selling business, which has been operational for over four years. She mentioned loss from disease outbreak as a challenge in the business. She dreams of becoming a wholesaler of poultry in the future. 

With the Kshs 25,000 she wants to purchase chicks and poultry feed for her business. Mercy joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and poultry feed for her business.

loans.name: Sonia Cecilia

texts.es: Sonia de 35 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en vivienda propia junto a sus 4 hijos 2 niñas de 20 y 3 años de edad y 2 varones de 5 y 17 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida como vendedora de verduras, en el mercado municipal, pero al no contar con un lugar estable para vender sus productos lo hace de manera ambulante recorriendo todo el mercado. Sonia desea construir un servicio sanitario lavable en su vivienda para dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, una taza lavable, ladrillos y tubos para construir un servicio lavable en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Sonia is 35 years old, single mother, and lives in her own house with her four children: two daughters who are 20 and 3 years old, and two sons who are 5 and 17 years old. She is an enterprising woman who earns her living as a vegetable vendor in the market of the municipality. Since she does not have a stable place to sell her goods, she sells them as a street vendor walking around the market.

Sonia wants to build a bathroom in her home in order to offer her family better living conditions. For this, she is asking for a loan with FUSAI in order to invest it in the purchase of: cement, sand, gravel, a basin, bricks, and pipes.

loans.use: to invest it in: cement, sand, gravel, a basin, bricks, and pipes to build a bathroom in her house.

loans.name: Erika Paola

texts.es:
Erika Paola tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera, sin hijos. Vive en casa de familiares en condiciones sencillas, junto a sus padres. Su familia es unida, viven en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia; dicha comunidad esta ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Erika Paola se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral(patos, cuyes, conejos, pavos, entre otros); y también se dedica al servicio de peluquería. Ella desea el crédito para la inversión en compra de insumos para tratamiento de belleza(tintes, esmaltes, revistas de modelo de cortes de pelo, pelucas, entre otros). Con ello tendrá una mejor atención a sus clientes ya que le dará un valor agregado a su servicio y por consecuente sus ingresos aunmetaran y habrá mejoras en sus ganancias y en su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Erika Paola is 28 years old, is single, and has no children. She lives with her parents in the house of her family, in simple living conditions. Her family is very close, they live in a community where the main activities are commerce, agriculture, and cattle-raising. This community is located in the district of Cayaltí, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region, on Peru's north coast.

Erika Paola works raising and selling small animals (ducks, guinea pigs, rabbits, turkeys, etc.), and she also has a hair salon. She asks for a loan to invest it in the purchase of products for beauty treatments (hair color, nail polish, magazines with model haircuts, wigs, etc.). With this, she can better attend to her customers and add value to her services, and as a consequence, her income will increase and her profits and her quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to invest it in the purchase of products for beauty treatments.

loans.name: Delmy Isabel

texts.es:
Delmy, tiene como fuente de ingresos la crianza de cerdos y un comedor, en la actualidad vive con su compañero de vida y dos hijos de 7 y 3 años de edad, los cuales son dependientes, no tienen parientes que le apoyen con ayuda económica del extranjero. El negocio lo inicio por motivación propia y la necesidad de aportar ayuda económica a su hogar, la venta de comida la realiza los días miércoles y domingos de seis de la mañana a doce del mediodía, con ayuda de una empelada, mientras que la crianza de cerdos lo hace todos los días con apoyo de su esposo en un horario de cinco de la mañana a tres de la tarde.
Invertirá en concentrado para cerdos, esta compra le ayudará a tener un negocio más amplio que le genere más ganancias, con las que dará un mejor estilo de vida a su familia y podrá resarcir su deuda, los riesgos son enfermedades que afecten a sus animales y que la comida del comedor no se venda en su totalidad.
Sus sueños son seguir trabajando para tener en un futuro un negocio más rentable, dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida, en cuanto a su preparación académica y alimenticia se refiere.
texts.en:
Delmy's source of income is the raising of pigs, and a small restaurant. She currently lives with her partner and two children, who are 7 and 3 years old. They depend on her and do not have relatives who help them with financial means from abroad.

She started her business from her own motivation and the necessity to help with the household expenses. She sells food on Wednesdays and Sundays, from 6 o' clock in the morning to 12 o'clock noon, with the help of an employee. For the pigs she raises, she cares every day with the help of her husband, from 5 o' clock in the morning until 3 o' clock in the afternoon.

She will invest in the purchase of feed for the pigs. This purchase will help her to have a lager business which generates more income. With this, she will provide a better quality of life for her family and will be able to repay her debt. The risks to her business are diseases that might befall the animals, and that the food in her restaurant may not be completely sold.

Her dream is to continue working in order to have a more profitable business in the future, and to provide her children with better living conditions, especially with regards to their academic education and their alimentation.

loans.use: to purchase feed for pigs. This purchase will help her to have a larger business which generates more income.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: María de 43 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 3 hijos de 19, 13 y 4 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que demuestra su tenacidad esforzándose por sacar adelante a su familia, prestando sus servicios domésticos de forma domiciliar, además su compañero de vida le aporta a la economía del hogar gracias a su trabajo, su hijo mayor también le aporta a la economía familiar. La vivienda de María está hecha de lamina pero actualmente cuenta con una lamina más resistente, ya que anteriormente había solicita un crédito a FUSAI con el que mejoró las paredes y el techo de su vivienda, por lo que ahora desea adquirir un nuevo crédito con FUSAI para invertir en: lamina galvanizada, madera y clavos para seguir reparando las paredes de su vivienda. Ella agradece a FUSAI por la confianza y porque gracias a el crédito otorgado esta mejorando su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is 43 years old. She lives in her own home together with her partner and their three children, who are 19, 13, and 4 years old. She is a woman who shows her tenacity in her efforts to get her family ahead: she offers domestic services, and in addition, her partner contributes to the household income through his work. Her oldest son also contributes to the household income.

María's home is made of galvanized metal sheets, but now she wants to replace them with stronger sheets. She had an earlier loan with FUSAI which she used to improve the walls and the roof of her home, and therefore she now wants to take out another loan with FUSAI to invest it in: galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails, in order to continue repairing the walls of her home. 

She thanks FUSAI for the trust and that, thanks to the loan, she can improve her home.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails to continue repairing the walls of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy scissors, blow dryers, and hair dye for her hair salon.

loans.name: Nelia Marina

texts.es:
Neila es una mujer ecuatoriana de 23 años de edad nacida en el Cantón Sigchos de la provincia de Cotopaxi, perteneciente a la República del Ecuador, es soltera, gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres pudo culminar la secundaria, por la mala situación económica de su hogar tubo que migrar a la ciudad es por eso que hoy en día vive en la ciudad de Latacunga en un barrio rural  y vive con sus padres y hermanos,  Neila  es comerciante de ropa indígena sus ventas en las diferentes ferias de la ciudad, además tiene un local en Zumbagua, Neila es una joven emprendedora y muy trabajadora, Neila vino a nosotros recomendada por su madre quien es cliente de la Fundacion, requiere el crédito para comprar más mercadería ya que tiene muchos pedidos pendientes por entregar.
Quiere en esta ocasión agradecer a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y hogar.
texts.en:
Neila is an Ecuadorian woman of 23 years. She was born in Sigchos Canton, in the province of Cotopaxi, which belongs to the Republic of Ecuador. She is single, and, thanks to the efforts of her parents, could complete secondary school. Because of the bad economic situation of the household, she had to move to the city. This is why she lives in Latacunga today, in a rural part of the town, and she lives with her parents and brothers.

Neila sells indigenous clothes. She sells in different markets in the city, and also has a small store in Zumbagua. Neila is an enterprising and hard-working young woman. She came to Fundación Alternativa on a recommendation of her mother, who is a client of Fundación. She is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise, because she has many pending orders she wants to fulfill.

She wants to take this opportunity to thank Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and Kiva for making it possible for her to grow in her job and at home.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise (clothing) for selling.

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es:
Ana tiene  30 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene un hijo, y además vive en casa de sus suegros.

Ana se dedica a los oficios domésticos en casa de sus suegros, como cocinar, lavar y planchar. Además visita a su mamá cada semana para hacerle un poco de compañía y llevarle algunas cosas de comer. 

Ella necesita el crédito para pagar un viaje de un familiar que es muy costoso, lo demás lo utilizará para cubrir algunos gastos de su hijo, ya que está empezando a estudiar y le piden útiles escolares y por el momento no cuenta con los suficientes recursos para incurrir en ese gasto.   

Su sueño es ver a su hijo graduándose de bachiller y brindarle la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Ana, 30, is in a relationship and has a child.  Also, she lives in her in-laws' house, where she takes care of the household chores such as cooking, cleaning, and ironing.  In addition, she visits her mother every week to keep her company and take her some things to eat.

Ana needs the loan to pay for a relative's trip that's very expensive.  She'll use the rest to cover some of her son's expenses.  He's starting school and they need to buy school supplies, but at the moment she doesn't have enough money for that expense.

Her dream is to see her son graduate from high school and have the opportunity to go to college.

loans.use: to pay for a relative's trip and to buy school supplies for her son

loans.name: Isam

texts.en:
Isam is a 34-year-old married man with two children. His oldest child is 3 and the youngest one is 2.  They live with his family in the capital city of Sana'a, Yemen. He completed school to the secondary school level but  couldn't complete his studies. 

Isam is a solider in the army. The salary that he receives from his job is not enough to cover the family's expenses. Isam seeks another source of  income  to help him improve the living conditions of his family. He is highly determination to improve the family's  living standards and to prepare his house to meet his family's needs.

He decided to start his own business in addition to his job in the public sector. He wants to purchase a taxi and transport people from one place to another inside the capital city of Sana'a.  This will help him to earn  enough money to provide his family with a better future.  His current salary didn't allow him to accumulate  the money, it was not enough to start his taxi business. He requests 500,000 YER from AMB to purchase and work as a driver to earn money and have another source of income for his family. 

Isam looks forward to opening a savings account in AMB to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a taxi.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 40-year-old married man and a father of five children. His oldest child is 18  and the youngest one is 5. Khaled lives with his family in his new house. He is an educated man with a University education. He is employed in the public sector. 

In the past, Khaled purchased a piece of land to build  his own house. His parents  supported him financially. Little by little, Khaled built some rooms, a small kitchen, and a bathroom. This construction cost him a lot of his own money but the house is not completed. 

Khaled requests 350,000 YER from AMB to purchase  cement, brick, and iron steel  to complete building his house and make it more comfortable and large.

Khaled looks forward to completing the house and  building another house  for his children, to provide them with a secure future.

loans.use: to purchase cement, brick, and iron steel.

loans.name: Ahmmed

texts.en:
Ahmmed is a 43-year-old married man with nine children. His oldest child is 12  and the youngest one is 1. Ahmmed lives with his family in his new house. He is an educated man with the Diploma certificate. He is an employee in a public sector and is a very dynamic and vigorous man. 

He accumulated a good amount of money and purchased a piece of land. His wife supported him with a lot of her own money. He is the  breadwinner of the family and his income is not enough to complete the building of the house.  Ahmmed requests 250,000 YER from AMB to purchase cement, bricks, and iron steels in order to complete the building of the house.

Ahmmed hopes to complete building his houses to it very suitable for living.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks, and iron steel.

loans.name: Las Perlitas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS PERLITAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Nancy Sonia ella es soltera y tiene 45 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de verduras, la socia vende zanahorias, tomates y pepinos, la socia tiene un puesto de mercado donde vende las verduras, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cebollas, zanahorias y pepinos.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “LAS PERLITAS” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco.  

The member's name is Nancy Sonia. She is single, 45 years old, and has 1 son. She works in the vegetable selling business. She sells carrots, tomatoes and cucumbers. She also has a sales stall in the market where she sells the vegetables. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. She has had this business for 8 years and it is going well for her. Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell her vegetables. She is asking for the loan to buy onions, carrots and cucumbers. 

The other members work selling vegetables, and clothing, owning a convenience store and owning a restaurant. 

She is grateful to those who have become a part of her dream in this way and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy onions, carrots and cucumbers.

loans.name: Joaquim

texts.pt:
O senhor Joaquim de 44 anos de idade é electrecista, casado e pai de 5 filhos 4 a estudarem 2 no ensino primario  e 2 no secundario vive na casa propria sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ele.
Com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a casa para dar um lar condigno a sua famίlia e dar um lar condigno a sua familia
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Joaquim is 44 years old. He works as an electrician and is married with five children, four of whom are in school. Two are in elementary school and two in high school. He also helps care for a nephew who lives with the family.

With this loan Joaquim would like to continue with his home construction project by buying supplies like cement, sand, stone, and poles. His dream is to finish the house in order to give his family a respectable place to live. He tells us that his main challenges are the financial ones presented by this construction project, and that he will take out further loans as needed to make his plans a reality.

loans.use: buy construction materials like cement, sand, stone, and poles.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 35-year-old married man and a father of 12 children, living with his big family in his own house, which is uncompleted. He is an educated man and has a diploma. Now, he is an employee in a public sector with a small salary. 

In the past, Khaled lived with his family in a very old house which he inherited from his father. That house was very old and threatened to fall down at any time, especially in the summer season. In order to avoid the collapse of that old house, Khaled decided to demolish it and build a new house on the same spot. That cost him a lot of money, and the new house is still not completed. He wants to finish it, but unfortunately he doesn't have enough money. 

For this reason, Khaled is requesting a loan of 250,000 YER from AMB. He will use the loan to purchase construction materials such as cement, bricks, and iron sheets in order to complete the building of his new house and make it more comfortable and large. He looks forward to completing the first floor and building the second floor to make the house more spacious.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 52-year-old married man and a father of two children. His older child is 35 years old and the younger one is 25 years old, and living with his family in the capital city of Sana'a, Yemen. He went to elementary school, but unfortunately, he couldn't complete his studies. Now, Mohammed is the sole breadwinner of the family and his income is not enough to cover all the expenses of the house, which lacks many home appliances, while others are very old. 

Mohammed wants to exchange some of his old home appliances for new ones. Unfortunately, he doesn't have enough money to do that. For this reason, he has applied for a loan of 200,000 YER to purchase some home appliances, such as a new TV and refrigerator, to improve the living standards of his family.

Mohammed looks forward to furnishing his home with new appliances. He also hopes to purchase a bus and work on it as a driver.

loans.use: to purchase some home appliances

loans.name: Jacob

texts.pt:
O senhor Jacob de 62 anos de idade é comerciante, casado e pai de 17 filhos dos quais 5 a estudarem 12 ja maiores de idade a viveram nas suas casas.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a casa para dar um lar condigno a sua famίlia e depois da casa construir também uma barraca para reforçar  a renda familiar e adiquirir uma viatura para uso familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa,Alem desta actividade faz prestacao de servicos como curandeiro e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Jacob is 62 years old. He works as an salesman and is married with 17 children, five of whom are in school. The other 12 are grown and live in their own homes. 

With this loan Jacob would like to continue with his home construction project by buying supplies like cement, sand, stone, and poles. His dream is to finish the house in order to give his family a respectable place to live. After this project is finished he would like to build a sales stand in order to increase the family income and buy a vehicle for his family's use.

He tells us that his main challenges are the financial ones presented by this construction project, and that he will take out further loans as needed to make his plans a reality. He also tells us that beyond his sales activities he works as a healer.

loans.use: buy construction materials like cement, sand, stone, and poles.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is married with two kids. She is a farmer and she has been operating her family's own farm for her gardening business. For over four years, her farm has needed fertilization to restore farm nutrients. With her income, she had successfully repaid her previous loan used for buying manure. She had to find ways to restore farm nutrients. Because of this, she took a new loan  to purchase organic fertilizer in order to restore nutrients to her land.

In the future, Cristina hopes to expand her farm and improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer in order to restore farm nutrients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy beans, chicken parts and gizzards, coconuts and sugar.

loans.name: And Liguey Marche 1 Group

texts.fr: AND LIGUEY MARCHE 1 est un groupement d'intérêt économique qui est composé de 8 femmes et 1 homme. Ils sont tous dans le meme marché et pratiquent les memes activités. Ils évoluent dans le commerce et Madame Marame est leur présidente. Ils se voient chaque jour et organisent des tontines à la fin de la journée. Marame est reconnue sur la photo par la main levée. Elle est mariée et mère de famille qui aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité des enfants. elle demande ce crédit de ce montant pour acheter des tissus, fils et perles pour confectionner des pagnes qu'elle revende à ses clients dans le marché. Elle démarre sa journée à 8h 30mn pour la terminer à 17h. A l'avenir, elle voudrait augmenter sa taille du marché et augmenter ses revenus ainsi elle pourra épargner de l'argent à coté.
texts.en: The And Liguey Marche 1 Group is a savings group made up of eight women and one man. They all work at the same market and run similar businesses. They see each other every day and organise tontines at the end of the working day. Marame, the woman with her hand raised in the photo, is the group's president. She is a married mother who assists her husband with their family's daily expenses and their children's school fees. She is requesting this loan so she can purchase fabrics, yarn and pearls in order to create pagne cloth which she will then resell to her customers at market. She starts her day at 8.30 AM and finishes work at 5 PM. In the future, she would to increase the size of her market stall and grow her revenue. By doing this, she will be able to save some money on the side.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, yarn and pearls in order to create pagne cloth

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan tiene 35 años de edad, está casado y  su esposa se dedica  a la compra y venta de pescado, juntos han procreado 3 hijos.

Juan se dedica a vender pan dulce y pan francés, también vende pescado y tamales de pollo, cuenta con 7 años realizando esta actividad, y fue la necesidad de sacar adelante a su familia lo que lo llevó a dedicarse a esto, él sale a vender en una motocicleta y su horario de trabajo es de 5:00 AM a 10:00 PM.


Él necesita el crédito para pagar una deuda que tiene pendiente.

Sus sueños son seguir luchando, que su negocio mejore y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Juan, 35, is married and his wife buys and sells fish.  They have three children together.

Juan earns a living selling pan dulce [sweet baked goods] and French bread.  He also sells fish and chicken tamales.  He has done this work for seven years, having started because he needed to get his family ahead.  He goes out to make sales on a motorcycle and he works from 5 a.m. until 10 p.m.

He needs the loan to pay back a debt.

His dreams are to keep on making progress, to improve his business, and for his children to become professionals.

loans.use: to pay back a debt

loans.name: Yuriko Nataly

texts.es:
Yuriko es una joven emprendedora de 20 años, soltera y vive en Huaraz junto a su familia. Es madre soltera de una preciosa niña de 2 meses por quien lucha constantemente para poder brindarle un futuro mejor.
Por iniciativa propia y con mucho esfuerzo y algunos ahorros pudo iniciar un pequeño negocio de venta de productos de belleza. Tiene muchos clientes y Yuriko cree que le va bien por su esfuerzo, dedicación y porque siempre es amable con sus clientes.
Yuriko está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar mayor variedad de mercadería para ofrecer a sus clientes, de esta manera sus ingresos mejorarán y apoyará a su familia. Así ella seguirá luchando para más adelante poder estudiar una profesión.
texts.en:
Yuriko is a 20-year-old entrepreneur who is single and lives with her family.  She is the single mother of a darling two-month-old daughter for whom she constantly struggles to be able to give her a better future. 

On her own initiative and with a great deal of effort and some savings, she was able to start a small business selling beauty products. She has many customers and Yuriko thinks that it is going well thanks to her effort and dedication and because she is always pleasant to her customers.

Yuriko is grateful to Kiva lenders because with the support they have provided she will be able to buy a greater variety of merchandise to offer to her customers. This will allow her income to grow so she can support her family. She will continue with her efforts so that one day she will be able to study to become a professional.

loans.use: to buy beauty products for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as iron, steel, bricks, cement, and other materials  in order to repair an old house.

loans.name: Awatef

texts.en:
Awatef is a 39-year-old married woman living with five children in Mokala city, Yemen. Her oldest child is 22 years old and the youngest one is 10 years old. She went to elementary school, but she could not complete her studies because she got married when she was very young. Her husband is the sole breadwinner of the family. In time, he became old and unable to look after the family, so Awatef decided to help him with that responsibility. For this reason, she decided to work as a beautician at her home. 

She believes that this business will be very suitable and profitable for her. Unfortunately, she does not have enough money to start her own business, so she has asked for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase beauty materials and different kinds of cosmetics, makeup, and accessories in order to start her own business as a beautician. Awatef looks forward to expanding her business through opening a beauty parlor in order to provide her family with a better future.

loans.use: to purchase materials in order to start her own business as a beautician.

loans.name: Santos Leonidas

texts.es:
Santos, está ofreciendo a sus clientes mejor variedad de productos y teniendo mayores ganancias por la buena administración del financiamiento anterior, la familia se mantiene brindándole el apoyo necesario para continuar trabajando.
Con el propósito de continuar creciendo con su negocio se decide a solicitar más capital para invertir en bebidas, golosinas, boquitas, jabón, detergentes y nuevos productos para suplir la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Santos is offering his customers a better variety of products, and having greater earning dues to the good management of his prior loan, the family continues enjoying the necessary support to continue working. With the purpose of continuing to grow his business, he has decided to request more capital to invest in drinks, candies, snacks, soap, detergents, and new products to satisfy the demand of his customers.

loans.use: invest in drinks, candies, snacks, soap, detergents, and new products to satisfy the demand of his customers

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 39 años de edad, su estado civil es soltero, vive en el distrito de Cayaltí, comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Él se dedica a la fabricación de productos metálicos como puertas, ventanas, objetos de metal, con más de 3 años de experiencia, su negocio se encuentra ubicado al costado de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de productos metálicos para abastecerse de mayor materia prima y asi poder atender los pedidos pendientes que tiene, lo que permitirá aumentar sus ingresos, mejorando sus ganancias y por consecuente la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 39 years old, single, and lives in the district of Cayaltí, a community of agriculture, trade, and cattle, located in the Province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque Region, on the north coast of Peru.

He works in the production of metal products like doors, windows, metal objects, and has more than 3 years of experience. His business is located next to his house.
